title: Denzel Tickets, Kanye Chicago, MJ North Carolina, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Bert and Ernie, Random Qustions, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Denzel Tickets, Kanye Chicago, MJ North Carolina, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Bert and Ernie, Random Qustions, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Denzel is told to move over by a high roller at the Canelo fight. Kanye says he is moving back to Chicago. Michael Jordan is giving $2 million to aid in relief for Hurricane Florence. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. Bert and Ernie are seriously just best friends. We also get to ask Steve random questions. Closing Remarks today talks about getting out of your comfort zone and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
